snippet.title: WonderHero Cinematic Game Trailer
snippet.description:
WonderHero is a NFT play-to-earn mobile game. The game is a turn-based RPG for iOS/Android where players collect Heroes, enter RPG combat and earn tokens. 

Highlights:
- Engaging Turn-based Tactical Battles
- Over 100+ Hero variations and 400+ equipment as NFT assets to collect
- Battle in PvE / PvP mode, win battles to earn NFT assets or tokens
- Comprehensive Play to Earn ecosystem, multiple ways to earn while playing!

Find out more:
WonderHero.io

//OFFICIAL CHANNELS
Discord: discord.io/wonderhero
Telegram Chat: t.me/wonderhero_io
Telegram Announcement: t.me/wonderhero_official
Facebook: facebook.com/wonderhero.io
Twitter: twitter.com/wonderhero_io
Medium: wonderhero.medium.com

#WonderHero #P2Emobile #PlaytoEarn
